Description:
--------------
Don King Boxing is the next foray into 2K sports games, this time about boxing and protected under the name of the famous manager of fighters. The game includes a career mode with training, fighting in tournaments and even a very light social simulation component in our relations with others between combat and combat. The game uses the Wii Balance Board.
